short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hourly reminders to make your Munchery order

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension reminds you every hour within the range specified in the settings (9am to 2pm by default) until you have made your order.

Once you make your order (press the checkout button), reminders are turned off for the rest of the day.

You can also turn off reminders for the day by pressing the extension button in the browser toolbar.

You can find the extension's settings page by going to Chrome Settings --> Extensions --> (find remuncher in the list of extensions) --> Options.

GitHub repo: https://github.com/eyuelt/remuncher
